title: Rick James You & I ( Soul Alive TV Performance 1978)

sources.title: Rick James You & I ( Soul Alive TV Performance 1978)
sources.description: In 1977, WPIX in NY aired a local program called "Soul Alive" that lasted 3 seasons(1977-1980). NYC host Gerry Bledsoe was the host of the program. The following is a clip from 1978 starring Rick James performing his hit song " You and I".Â
